org.svvrl.goal.core.aut.fsa
Class Intersection

java.lang.Object
  org.svvrl.goal.core.aut.fsa.Intersection

public class Intersection
extends java.lang.Object

An Intersection provides methods for taking the intersection of two classic finite state automata or two ω-automata.

Author:
Ming-Hsien Tsai

          This class defines states in the intersected NFW.

Constructor Detail

Method Detail

intersect

public static FSA intersect(FSA aut1,
                            FSA aut2)
                     throws java.lang.IllegalArgumentException
Constructs the intersection of two classic finite automata or two ω-automata.

Parameters:
aut1 - a classic finite automaton or an ω-automaton
aut2 - an automaton that has the same type as aut1
Returns:
the intersection of aut1 and aut2
Throws:
java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - if (1) aut1 and aut2 have different alphabet types, (2) not aut1 and aut2 are both classic finite automata or are both ω-automata, or (3) aut1 and aut2 are ω-automata but one of them cannot be converted to an equivalent NBW
